issue.title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
I don't think that there's much to be done about this issue at this point.

The GPU-based sensors have to queue for access to the GPU to do rendering.  Activating more sensors puts more in that queue and you'll eventually be rate-limited by access to the GPU.

The current behavior has been in place since we [switched the MultiSense-SL laser to use the GPU](#!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/254/gazebo_ros_gpu_laser_plugin-for-default/diff), first released in [drcsim 2.6.0 on May 17th](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Change_log#drcsim_2.6.0_.282013-05-17.29).

It's unfortunate that you're just encountering this behavior now.  It hadn't occurred to us that a team would practice with simulation slowed down.
